page.title: 07EVENTS - CHELWOOD GATE
page.content: Public events in the village are cent- red on the Village Hall. In mid- December there is the Christmas Tree Lighting, with carol singing, perfor- mances by children's groups and a col- lection for a local charity. The Hall Management Committee also organises two supper dances each year; and a whist drive each month from October to April. Every other year it holds a fund-raising Fete. The organisations that use the Hall are invited to contribute by arranging stalls, compe- titions etc., with a proportion of the profits going to the Hall. The gardens of Birch Grove House are opened to the public two Sundays during spring (by the Macmillan family see BIOGRAPHY).
